summary: THE BRAKES OF MY DODGE DAKOTA STARTED TO PULSE.  I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER AT 24,000 MILES AND THE ROTORS WERE WORN TO BELOW MINIMUM STANDARDS.  THE REAR DRUMS HAD TO BE CUT.  I DRIVE HIGHWAY WITH NO TOWING AND MINIMAL STOP GO DRIVING.  I HAVE NEVER HAD A VEHICLE DO THIS TO ME BEFORE SO IT IS NOT MY DRIVING.   *NLM
